page.title: 13T.V. fame for Cossington
page.content: We fed the owls every night at 6.30.People came down from school, we had to go into the barn very quietly so it would'nt frighten the owls,we fed them on dead chicks,they were from the chicken factory.Each owl had 3 chicks.We pushed them through a hole in the wire for safety.If they left any chicks we took them out of the cages. T.V. and release. When we were going to put the 4 Barn Owls into the main cage Central Television paid us a visit to film Mr Marney talking about releasing 4 barn owls that he had bred in captivity.Then we went up to Katherines farm and put the barn owls in and after four weeks put two into a separate cage.Continued from page 11,12.By Katherine Porter and Nicola Bell,aged 11.
